subsection.name: Stable
subsection.p: The current stable version is 1.0 and is available via Maven, Ivy or direct download.

subsection.name: SNAPSHOT
subsection.p: Snapshot versions are subject to change without notice. The version of this documentation refers to is indicated in the top right and may differ to previous stable releases. Although we'll try not to alter the API significantly, any changes to the API are documented in the change report. You can always checkout directly form Subversion if your millage varies.

section.name: Download Instructions
section.p: The project is published via the java.net Maven repository.

You can download the source and binary jar directly from
http://download.java.net/maven/2/com/google/code/tempus-fugit/ or use Maven or Ivy.

subsection.name: Maven 2
subsection.p: Add the java.net repository to your project's pom.xml, or into Maven's configuration (using conf/settings.xml).

section.p: Then add a dependency as usually to your pom.xml.

subsection.name: Source Code and Issue Tracking
subsection.p: Feel free to browse the source code and send comments and feedback. Any issues (bugs) you might discover can be raised and tracked through the issue management system.
